Also, about that later release thing. Just one word - patience.
Watching TBBT isn't something you have to do asap. Speaking of which, I really don't understand people watching CAMs and similar crap just because they are impatient, I always thought those releases are only good for translators to prepare subtitles for DVD/BR... But hey, patience comes with age right? That's why we say "impatient like a little kid".
But now went off-topic, sorry and enjoy the show.
